DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether kinesio tap method effective treatment chronic ( six month duration ) low back pain .

DOC.criteria: Age 18 65 year . Chronic low back pain least 6 month duration . Improvement pain mobilization skin/fascias physical examination . Signature informed consent . Having previous treatment experience kinesio tap method . Presence component neuropathic pain ( radiculopathy , lumbar canal stenosis ) . Specific origin pain ( vertebral fracture , tumor nerve column structure , spondyloarthropathy , spondylodiscitis ) . Prior spine surgery . Mental retardation , severe mental illness , substance abuse dependency , illiteracy .
